translations.translation: An error has occurred loading the information: {{message}}
You will find here general information about your managed Kubernetes service, and how to access it using theKubectl tool.
You can reset you cluster at any time.
An error has occurred loading the kubeconfig file
The kubectl command-line tool uses kubeconfig files to find the information it needs to choose a cluster and communicate with the API server of a cluster.
More information can be found here
Réinitialiser la configuration de votre cluster Kubernetes

En cliquant ici vous remettrez votre service Kubernetes dans son état original. Cela supprimera l'intégralité de vos nœuds de calcul, vos services, leur configuration etc... Cette action est irréversible.
Votre cluster Kubernetes est en cours de réinitialisation.
Une erreur est survenue lors de la réinitialisation de votre cluster : {{ message }}
Entrez "RESET" dans le champ ci-dessous pour confirmer
During beta stage, your nodes will be spwawned in GRA5. We will allow you to change this in the future.
An error has occurred loading the flavors: {{message}}
Select a Flavor in our PCI catalogue
Het quota van uw project laat u niet toe om een machine toe te voegen met zoveel CPU.
Uw project quota laat u niet toe om een machine met deze hoeveelheid RAM toe te voegen.
U heeft het maximale aantal machines voor deze regio bereikt.
An error has occurred adding the node: {{message}}
Are you sure you want to delete {{ node}} ?
Type DELETE in the following field to confirm your action.
An error has occurred deleting the node: {{message}}
An error has occurred loading nodes: {{message}}
An error has occurred loading flavor
An error has occurred loading public cloud project

Your Kubernetes cluster needs nodes to host your containers and services. All your nodes will be spawned in the {{ description }} public cloud project (we will allow to change this in a future version of the service).
Deze instances worden ingezet met standaard facturering per uur. U kunt details over uw factuur vinden en overschakelen naar een maandelijks abonnement in uw Public Cloud project.
Het aantal resources voor uw Cloud project is beperkt, zodat uw resource verbruik beperkt blijft.
Als u meer resources nodig heeft, kunt u hierom verzoeken door op de onderstaande knop te klikken.
{{ name }} ({{ cpuNumber }} CPU {{ ramCapacity }}GB RAM {{ diskCapacity }}GB DisK)
You will see here all containers and services running in your kubernetes cluster.

In the meantime, we invite you to use either the `kubectl` command line interface or setup the "Kubernetes Dashboard" in your cluster. Kubernetes Dashboard is a community project consisting in a web UI, that is itself a service exposed in your cluster.
Follow this guide to install Kubernetes Dashboard
During the beta phase, please find documentation, including how to orchestrate your services and expose them on the internet on the Kubernetes section on labs.ovh.com.
